amendment.description: At the end of division C (before the short title) insert the following: Sec. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to propose, plan for, or execute a new or additional Base Realignment and Closure (BRAC) round.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ratcliffe amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ratcliffe amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Ratcliffe.
